comments:
While synchroniziong with CVS the following exception was thrown eclipse
internally and the operation was not successful. The resource were refreshed and
I tried more then one time:

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronizing CVS (/jpx-demos-ejb)".

This could be due to either a null argument being passed at some point or a 
resource whose local gender differs from the remote gender. We should add 
asserts for the first problems and proper testing for the second.

I'm getting these regularly with I20060614-0843 when synchronizing project dev.eclipse.org/cvsroot/org.eclipse/www (with lots of incoming additions)

I recently switched to a dual core processor, which could maybe be relevant.
